caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. RANCOURT WOODELL, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 862 MAL 2004, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby denied.
